title.narrative: Chamber of Commerce (COC) - - SKYVUE SOLUTIONS CONSTRUCTION APPS PROJECT

description.narrative: SkyVue Solutions intends to provide a two-app system for people managing construction projects to monitor their projects from afar. The apps are SkyVue CAPTURE for capturing data on the job site and SkyVue ACCESS which is used to visualize and interact with the data. with a web and mobile app.

description.narrative: Accessing healthcare facilities is a huge challenge in Africa. eDoctar is a telemedicine platform offering a video/text-based online remote medical consultations services across operating across rural .eDoctar uses a web and mobile app that enables integration for a wide variety of medical devices in partnership with local health centers and clinics. The goal is to create telemedicine centers to connect patients to doctors remotely.

title.narrative: Young African Leaders Initiative (YALI) - AGRI INVEST

description.narrative: The real challenge of competitive rice production and marketing in Cameroon relies on a quality product and the emergence of more professional farms. AGRI-INVEST LLC aims to progressively respond to the issue by channeling the existing local production of rice to the domestic market while ensuring a quality processing (and increasing gradually its capacity) and supervise, train farmers on their farming activity to boost their production on a professional way., ,

title.narrative: AIT Group's Poultry Day Old Chicks Hatchery

description.narrative: Sector: Poultry. The initiative will provide 2000 small and medium scale farmers have access to affordable, quality inputs (poultry Day-old Chicks) for their operations which will increase their productivity and generate more jobs. 40-70 students will perform internships at the hatchery and on poultry farms. a percentage of those trained students will be employed at the hatchery and make extra money.

description.narrative: Chicken farmers and purveyors in Cameroon face high costs and uncertain input supplies; and have few processing plants or specialized retail buyers. David is improving farmers' productivity and take-home income; by training farmers on best practices; regularizing access to feed and supplies; and building new markets.

description.narrative: The purpose of this project is to provide seed capital to Delphine Konda to produce and distribute approximately 2,000 hand sanitizers to women and girls in three vulnerable communities in Limbe, Cameroon. This distribution will be accompanied by a door-to-door educational outreach initiative to sensitize the communities on the need to take precautions to decrease the likelihood of contacting and spreading the virus. This outreach would use the local language to ensure comprehension. Girls Excel will expand their social media strategy and provide updates based on field intel.
